OCC to Moon Mist: Yes, I knew that BrightBlade didn't know, I wanted to kill
Gangon off but I left it open for him to come back instead, so maybe one day
he can be back up with BrightBlade again...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 8:45 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars




( BB: Yes, Code. I know Gangon's spark was taken.but BrightBlade does not
know so she still thinks that he is whole somewhere. But thanx for the info
anyway.)

* BrightBlade nodded towards Hell Beast as she then stood to her full
height, with a quick bow she then turned on her heel and began to walk
towards her quarters.
She had plans for this new ship, plans that could give the Predacons a leg
up towards total victory.if it worked.
With a satisfied sigh she turned a corner and began to walk down the hall
leading to her rooms, she would need a few things from her quarters if she
were to be successful in her present mission. *
